resources.string: Muyenera kuvomereza chilolezo chamalo kuti Securitly agwire ntchito
Securitly ayenera kudziwa malo anu nthawi zonse

Mukufuna kuyatsa malo anu?
Pitani ku Zikhazikiko -> Mapulogalamu -> Securitly -> Lolani malo nthawi zonse.

Ndiye kuyambitsanso Securitly
Tumizani uthenga wadzidzidzi pamene mulingo wa batri wafika
Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kukhazikitsanso data yokhazikika?
Kodi mukufuna kuchotsa amene mumalumikizana nawo?

1. Securitly ayenera kudziwa malo anu nthawi zonse. Kuti muchite izi, pitani ku zoikamo za chipangizo chanu -> mapulogalamu -> Securitly -> Zilolezo ndikusintha chilolezo cha malo kuti "Lolani nthawi zonse".
2.Musakakamize kutseka Securitly. Apo ayi, uthenga wanu wadzidzidzi sudzatumizidwa kwa omwe mumacheza nawo.
3. Sitikulimbikitsani kuti muyike mulingo wa batri womwe mudzatumize uthenga wanu wadzidzidzi ku 1 kapena 2%, popeza chipangizo chanu chikhoza kuzimitsa musanatumize uthengawo.

"Pulogalamuyi idapangidwa ndi ophunzira 5 ochokera ku Technological Institute of Laguna, Mexico. Ntchitoyi inayamba ngati lingaliro lomwe tinakonza kuti litheke, ndipo pamodzi ndi mlangizi wathu, injiniya Gerardo, tinakwanitsa. Ndi pulogalamuyi tikuyembekeza kuthandizira pangono ndi zomwe zikuchitika padziko lapansi."

Malo omaliza chida changa chinali:
latitude:
40.776570
kutalika: -73.969979
Central Park West Historic District
New York, 10024, EE. UUU.
Securitly sangagwire ntchito chifukwa chilolezo cha "Tumizani SMS" sichinaperekedwe
Securitly sangagwire ntchito chifukwa chilolezo cha "Nthawi Zonse" sichinaperekedwe. Securitly ikuyenera kudziwa komwe muli kuti itumize komwe mudadziwika komaliza kwa omwe mwawasankha
Panali vuto popeza malo osankhidwa a chipangizochi
Osawonetsa "malo ofunikira" mphukira pomwe Securitly ayamba
